content: **gauge** 5 pattern repeats = 7 18 cm 12 row = 4 10 cm in shell pattern of lower section 20 sts = 4 10 cm in half_double_crochet half_double_crochet after blocking check your gauge use any size hook to obtain the gauge directions are for size x-small/small changes for sizes medium/large x-large/2x-large and 3x-large/4x-large are in parentheses **to fit bust ** 30-34 36-42 44-50 52-58 76-86 5 91 5-106 5 112-127 132-147 5 cm **finished bust/hip ** 42 48 56 65 106 5 122 142 165 cm after blocking **finished length ** 36 37 38 39 91 5 94 96 5 99 cm **red heart® it s a wrap ** 2 2 3 3 cakes 9243 western
